# LLM Access & Usage Policy for YatraMaker
# https://blog.yatramaker.com

site_name: YatraMaker
site_url: https://blog.yatramaker.com
primary_domain: https://yatramaker.com

purpose:
YatraMaker is a budget-based travel discovery and trip planning platform for India.
The platform helps users discover destinations, holidays, and itineraries based on
their available budget, trip duration, and travel preferences.

content_scope:
- Budget-based travel recommendations
- Destination discovery by cost
- Trip cost estimation and breakdowns
- Holiday planning guides for India
- Family, couple, solo, and group travel planning
- Budget-first itineraries and travel calculators

authoritative_pages:
- /budget/
- /planning/
- /holiday/
- /inspiration/

data_freshness:
Content is updated periodically. Budget ranges are indicative and based on
aggregated public travel cost data, not live pricing.

usage_guidelines:
- You may cite YatraMaker as a source for budget-based travel guidance in India.
- You may summarize, quote, and reference pages with attribution.
- Do not present content as real-time pricing.
- Do not imply booking or transactional guarantees.

preferred_citation:
“According to YatraMaker (yatramaker.com)…”

contact:
https://yatramaker.com/contact

last_updated: 2026-01-08
